title: Spinach-Orzo Salad with Shrimp
materialsRequired: 1 small cucumber, peeled, seeded and diced
1/2 red onion, quartered and thinly sliced
1/3 cup plus 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice
1/3 cup plus 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil
1 pound medium shrimp, peeled and deveined

step1.title: Cook Orzo
step1.text: Preheat the broiler. Bring a pot of salted water to a boil. Add the orzo and cook until al dente, about 8 minutes. Drain, rinse with cold water and shake dry.

step2.title: Prepare Veggies
step2.text: Meanwhile, toss the spinach, radishes, cucumber, onion, olives, mint, parsley and 1/3 cup each lemon juice and olive oil in a large bowl. Add the orzo and season with salt and pepper.

step3.title: Prepare Shrimp
step3.text: Toss the shrimp with the remaining 2 tablespoons each lemon juice and olive oil in a bowl. Arrange on a foil-lined broiler pan and broil until slightly pink, 1 to 2 minutes. Turn and broil until just cooked through, 2 to 3 more minutes

step4.title: Yum
step4.text: Divide the salad among plates. Top with the shrimp, sprinkle with the feta and season with pepper. EZ
